location.name: cottage
location.description: You found a country-style cottage. Maybe you can steal some food? After all, you are very hungry and wanted to stock up more food and supplies.

com.company.LevelNode@c81cdd1.text:
You go into the storage room and find a muscular man in his mid 30's.
He doesn't seem to have noticed you yet.

com.company.LevelNode@543c6f6d.text: You manage to get out of the room and slam the door. You go to look around to see what else you can find in the cottage. You go into the toilet which is right next to the living room.

com.company.LevelNode@43738a82.text:
You go into the storage room and find a muscular man in his mid 30's.
He doesn't seem to have noticed you yet.

com.company.LevelNode@32eebfca.text: You approach the child, and take a closer look.

com.company.LevelNode@13eb8acf.text:
Win/Lose. If lose, deathexception. If win, go to next step. Here default win
Trying to find something useful, you open a drawer in a shelf to your right.

com.company.LevelNode@4e718207.text:
You gently shake the child to wake her up.
To your horror, she was actually pretending to be asleep and was hiding a kitchen knife in her hand behind her.
You don't want to hurt child, but at the same time, you don't want to die.

You don't want to wake her up since she seems to be comfortable lying there, you follow your initial plan and take a break for a while.
You creep towards toilet, go in, and carefully close the door.

com.company.LevelNode@51c8530f.text:
Congratulations, you found a hunting kit. Now, hunting kit has been added to your inventory!
You find a storage room

com.company.LevelNode@1fc2b765.text:
You tap him on the shoulder and ask what he is doing.
It turns out that he is a hunter, and had stopped by this cottage to search for useful tools and weapons.

He tells you that he found AR-15 style 12 gauge with muzzle flash and 2 mags with 10 round capacity in the room.
Thinking it will be great to accompany him, you suggest working together to find a vaccine.

Hunter joined your team.
Choose the next location to go.

You ignore the man and leave the cottage.
Choose the next location to go.

com.company.LevelNode@1d371b2d.text: You manage to get out of the room and slam the door. You go to look around to see what else you can find in the cottage. You go into the toilet which is right next to the living room.

com.company.LevelNode@7403c468.text:
Congratulations, you found a hunting kit. Now, hunting kit has been added to your inventory!
You find a storage room

currentNode.text: You go inside the cottage and catch a glimpse of a child sitting on the cozy sofa in the small living room. She is dozing off, probably because it is warm inside.
